title: SEE PICS: Mira joins Shahid-Kangana for Rangoon screening : Bollywood, News - India Today
text:
SEE PICS: Mira joins Shahid-Kangana for Rangoon screening Shahid Kapoor and Kangana Ranaut were joined by Mira Rajput at Rangoon screening. IndiaToday.in | Written by Charu Thakur A + A - Mira Rajput with Rangoon team 
Shahid Kapoor and Kangana Ranaut are back in town after non-stop promotions. And the two-actors got together with director Vishal Bhardwaj for the screening of Rangoon. Brushing the rumours of a cold war aside, Shahid and Kangana were seen happily posing for the shutterbugs at the screening. 
And the on screen couple was joined by Shahid's wife Mira Rajput. Clad in a printed dress, Mira stood beside her husband during photo op. â€” Rangoon (@RangoonTheFilm) February 22, 2017 
Apart from Mira, Bollywood stars also were in attendance at Rangoon screening. From Sonakshi Sinha to Jacqueline Fernandez to Sushant Singh Rajput to Kriti Sanon, many B-Town celebs had come to cheer for Rangoon. 
Rangoon's official Twitter page gave a sneak-peek into the craziness that happened during the film's interval. Always time for that one click!All going down at the interval of #RangoonScreening #DavidDhawan @shahidkapoor @Asli_Jacqueline pic.twitter.com/gNKnu7xAOH â€” Rangoon (@RangoonTheFilm) February 22, 2017 
However, Saif was nowhere to be seen. Rangoon is a love triangle set against the backdrop of World War II. Kangana plays an actor, while Shahid will essay the role of an army officer in the film. Rangoon is set to hit the screens on February 24. 
(Photos: Yogen Shah)
